The CEO of Yum: Brands, which owns Pizza Hut and Taco Bell, is not the CEO of the company that owns Wendy's, Taco Bell, and Pizza Hut, and neither has donated to Trump.
The executive who donated to Trump: s re-election campaign is James Bodenstedt, the founder of MUY! Brands, a fast-food franchising company with Wendy's, Taco Bell, and Pizza Hut locations.
James Bodenstedt has made 44 donations t: s re-election, including the Trump campaign, Trump Victory, and the Republican National Committee.
The claim that the CEO of the company th: s, Taco Bell, and Pizza Hut donated $400,000 towards Trump's re-election campaign is inaccurate and garbled.
